00033 /**
00034  * \file
00035  *      Architecture-specific definitions for the SHT11 sensor on MSB-430.
00036  * \author
00037  *      Nicolas Tsiftes <nvt@sics.se>
00038  */
00039 
00040 #ifndef SHT11_ARCH_H
00041 #define SHT11_ARCH_H
00042 
00043 #define SHT11_ARCH_SDA  4       /* P3.4 */
00044 #define SHT11_ARCH_SCL  5       /* P3.5 */
00045 #define SHT11_ARCH_PWR  6       /* P3.6 */
00046 
00047 #define SHT11_PxDIR     P3DIR
00048 #define SHT11_PxIN      P3IN
00049 #define SHT11_PxOUT     P3OUT
00050 #define SHT11_PxSEL     P3SEL
00051 
00052 #endif
